src_original: Vin_2.2111 / [34a4] na sāmiṣeṇodakenāntarikaṃ bhikṣuṃ siñcet* /  Vin_2.2112 / naitad antargṛhe chorayed anavalokya gṛhapatiṃ /  Vin_2.2113 / na pātreṇa vighasaṃ chorayet* /  Vin_2.2114 / triḥ prakṣālya pātramārṣabhir gāthābhir abhimantrapātrodakaṃ dadyāt* /
Vin_2.2115 / nānāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pātraṃ sthāpayeta /  Vin_2.2117 / nāsyaitad ubhayam ataṭo kuryāt* /
Vin_2.2118 / na prapātena prāgbhāreṇa na catuspathe /  Vin_2.2119 / [34a5] nānuśrotonena nadyāhāryahāriṇyāḥ pānīyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt* /  Vin_2.2120 / prāg uccāraprasrāvād aglānāya /
Vin_2.2121 / tatrāglānaḥ /  Vin_2.2122 / notthito niṣaṇṇāya dharmaṃ deśayet* /  Vin_2.2123 / na niṣaṇṇo nipannāya /  Vin_2.2124 / na nīcatarāsane niṣaṇṇa uccatarake niṣaṇṇāya /
